title: [Twitter] Investigation on the Nigerian press incident

replies.msg:
Hi, this is Jet again.

For those of you who have been on Twitter regularly, you are probably aware of an incident concerning alleged bribery from the Hong Kong Police to a Nigerian journalist named Ejike 'Ejiblinks' Ofoegbu (@ejikeofoegbu1) in September. The journalist was also associated with a known fake Twitter account called Nas Daily (@NasDailyVideo). Over the past month, I tried my very best to investigate further on the issue, and here's the link to my detailed report (along with a TLDR version):

Detailed report:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1sPaTdFWnb-ePZJJi9xoR0Sli1dBcMjXN8RlRJPPKGoQ/edit?usp=sharing

TLDR version:
[詳細報告+懶人包] 上個月Twitter尼日利亞記者事件的進一步調查
- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區
https://lih.kg/1634666

The report is only available in Chinese at the moment. Really sorry that I probably won't have time to translate it to English. If you don't understand Chinese, feel free to leave a question down below. I will try my best to reply ASAP.

P.S. This is a repost. (As you might know) I posted yesterday on the 'Current Affairs' section, but it 'sank' rather quickly due to high internet traffic there. I believe quite a number of you (both LIHKG and Twitter users) know about the Nigerian press incident and I hope most of you could be fully informed via this repost. Thanks!

Both true, but I can't be 100% sure (especially his agenda).

Some more background info (in case you wanna know):
關於Twitter尼日利亞記者及假NasDaily帳號嘅一啲整合
https://lih.kg/1556591
- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區

The whole incident started with the Whatsapp chat along with the Nas Daily account on Twitter claiming that he will come to HK and make a video. It looked really fishy so me and my Twitter buddies did some preliminary research on both accounts. We had 2 important findings:

1. The Nas Daily account is fake
2. Both accounts had the same phone number

The Nigerian journalist immediately accused Nas Daily of stealing his personal info after we exposed him.

My original intent was to look for any relationship between the two accounts to break his lies. Eventually I did a little more and came up with the conclusion you just pointed out.
